desc: AJAX and PHP: Building Responsive Web Applications is the most practical and efficient resource a reader can get to enter the exciting world of AJAX. This book will teach you how to create faster, lighter, better web applications by using the AJAX ingredients technologies to their full potential. This book is for web developers willing to build better web applications. A basic knowledge of PHP, XML, JavaScript and MySQL, or a strong will to learn-as-you-type, is assumed.

details.authors: Bogdan Brinzarea, Filip Chereches-Tosa, Mihai Bucica

title: AJAX and PHP: Building Responsive Web Applications
